name: Can It Be Eaten?
description:
For the next 30 days, you're all that stands between 100 hungry kids and rotten lunches! 

Each day a tasty (or not) tray of school lunch will slide your way. Check the names, check the colors, and if all looks good, mark it Safe. If it's not, hit the Unsafe button. 

Failing means sick students. Too many sick students and you're FIRED. :o

Good luck!
